name: To Free Ethos
description:
To Free Ethos is a traditional 2D Pico-8 style platformer in which you play as a member of the Mapuche tribe in the 19th century in which you embark on a quest to reach the Ngen for aid. Strewn along your journey are malevolent forces such as the Wekufes, beings composed of malevolent, harmful energy which come between you and your destination. With the use of your trusty bow and arrow, will you be able to traverse through the precarious and unchancy terrain safely?

This game contains one level, consisting of two main sections: The village and the forest.[ Controls ]

Arrow Keys/WSAD - Left and right movement.

Spacebar - Ground jumping and Arrow jumping.

E - Unequip and Re-equip your bow (only if not crouching, if there's an issue where you can crouch while holding the bow then crouch and press E once to fix the issue).

Shift - Crouching/Crawling when grounded and Wall sliding when against a wall in the air.

Left mouse button - Hold to charge up a bow while equipped and release to shoot.
